article_title: Irish president accuses Israeli embassy of Iran letter leak
sentence: The  spokesperson  referenced  the  7  October  2023  Hamas  attack  on  concert  goers  in  Israel  when  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  more  than  250  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Irish president accuses Israeli embassy of Iran letter leak
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  has  said  more  than  40,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  because  of  Israel's  response.
